about: I work at the intersection of HCI and responsible AI, studying how people collaborate with increasingly agentic AI systems in complex tasks. I design and develop interactive interfaces that adapt to practitioner needs in decision-making and beyond.

education.degree: MSc in Computing (AI and Machine Learning)

education.thesis: Variational Autoencoder Based Feature Extraction and Data Visualisation

professional.title: Research Scientist Intern
description: Developed persona-based browser agents for automated usability testing of website prototypes
Built an interactive interface to communicate agent reasoning and decision processes to UX professionals, enabling interpretable and data-driven design evaluation

professional.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Responsibilities spanned the machine learning pipeline, from coordinating data annotation to training models and putting them into production on a worldwide fleet of autonomous delivery robots
Developed and maintained custom state-of-the-art deep learning models for object detection, vehicle tracking and semantic segmentation

research.title: Research Assistant
description: Used a reinforcement learning inspired approach to create a framework that learns customized user specific explanations based on individual behaviour and interactions with AI systems
Formulated, designed, and conducted experiments introducing the human as an agent in AI assisted sequential decision making

research.title: Research Fellow
description: My research aimed to improve area coverage control for a swarm of collaborative drones
Focused on using 360-degree spherical cameras to perform relative UAV localisation
Implemented computer vision algorithms to identify and track neighbouring drones

research.title: Research Assistant
description: Worked to develop efficient visual analytics tools to understand and explain machine learning models
Designed and implemented a novel method for generating counterfactual explanations to increase interpretability at both global and local level
